images.copyright: Inscription Wall at the Martin Luther King Jr. Memorial in Washington, DC (© Ken Howard/Alamy)
images.title: Words of wisdom
images.caption: Martin Luther King Jr. Day
images.desc: This striking memorial to Civil Rights icon Martin Luther King, Jr., displays 14 powerful quotes from his speeches and writings. The Inscription Wall, in Washington DC, lets the visitor browse the quotes without the structure of a timeline—the earliest quote dates to 1956 and the Montgomery Bus Boycott; the most recent is taken from Dr. King's sermon at the National Cathedral in Washington just four days before he was assassinated.
